article_metadata.description: ‘Normal is a range” is a speech I’ve been giving too many parents of children with autism lately. On the third anniversary of California’s “autism insurance mandate,” I’ve been seeing fewer 3-year-olds who really benefit from the intensive, expensive therapy and more older kids who are just a tad odd, if you’ll forgive the clinical reference.
article_metadata.title: Steve Taylor: Autism insurance law is for 3-year-olds | The Modesto Bee
